title: Prevent Typhoid
content:
Prevent typhoid.

1. Drink boiled water. 
2. Eat foods that are thoroughly cooked and still hot and steaming, avoid eating raw fruits and vegetables if they cannot be well washed and peeled. 
3. Avoid eating the peelings of the fruits, avoid foods and beverages from the vendors in the streets. 
4. Regularly wash hands with soap after using the washrooms.
5. Regularly wash hands with soap before handling food. 
6. Use pit latrines or toilets to ease oneself. Keep them clean using detergents.
7. Go to the health centre or hospital immediately you realise you have the symptoms. 

There is a typhoid vaccine that one can take and it lasts three years.
